title: Crashes when applying patches
body:
Hi there i am new to this , well... a lot new..cuz i'm still downloading this....
Anyways i was downloading this game come across many issues 33% stuck 99% stuck and crashes and calculating differences and 
I even re-downloaded the whole game even tho i have the **80 KBps download speed**...
But i resolved this by searching on online...and 

Now i got this **CRASH WHEN APPLYING PATCHES**. I was so happy that the download was gonna finish when it came to applying patches and............
   **_CRASH --- BUG SPLAT_** and my feelings at the time was WHAT THE F!@!@#!$$%@$%@$%$@@#$@!@!@#$K!!!! can anyone say me a fix for this?

P.S sorry if my english is bad

replies.body:
Have you already tried the solutions provided in the Patching Issues thread? If not, give those a go and let me know if that resolves your issues. 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/PuEpZLzo-having-patching-issues-try-these-solutions
